title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
**Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - Your Perfect Audio Companion**

Elevate your listening experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, designed for those who demand both quality and durability in a portable package. Finished in a sleek black color, this speaker is engineered to provide deep, clear, and immersive audio, whether you're at home or on the go.

**Product Features:**

- **High-Quality Audio:** Enjoy the rich, nuanced sound with deep bass and clear audio, thanks to the custom-engineered transducer and exclusive PositionIQ technology that optimizes sound based on the speaker's orientation.
- **Rugged Durability:** With an IP67 waterproof rating, this speaker is not only waterproof but also floats on water. It's dust, shock, and corrosion-resistant, ensuring your music can play on no matter the environment.
- **Ultimate Portability:** The compact design, coupled with a convenient utility loop, makes it easy to hold, store, and secure. Bring your music to any adventure, from poolside parties to mountain treks.
- **Long-Lasting Battery:** The powerful Lithium-ion battery offers up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge. When it's time to recharge, the included USB-C cable will have it ready in approximately 4 hours.
- **Smart Connectivity:** Bluetooth technology provides a stable connection within a 30-foot range. Built-in microphone and access to Siri and Google Assistant make hands-free calls and voice control seamless.
- **Bose Connect App Support:** Customize your settings and stay up-to-date with software updates through the Bose Connect App, enhancing your audio experience with each use.
- **Versatility for Every Occasion:** Tailor-made for travel, outdoor adventures, and pool use, this speaker adapts to your lifestyle and sets the mood wherever you are.

Don't just listen to music—immerse yourself in it with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Whether you're seeking adventure or relaxation, this speaker has you covered. Order now and be ready for wherever life's soundtrack takes you!

**Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - Your Go-Anywhere Audio Companion**

Elevate your listening experience with the unparalleled Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, designed for those who crave deep, clear, and immersive audio on the go. The sleek black portable speaker with a built-in microphone is your perfect travel, outdoor, and poolside partner, delivering high-quality sound wherever life takes you.

**Key Features:**

- **Superior Sound Quality:** Enjoy deep bass, clear audio, and an immersive listening experience thanks to exclusive technologies, including a custom-engineered transducer and innovative PositionIQ technology.
- **Robust Durability:** Adventure with confidence as the SoundLink Flex is waterproof (IP67 rated), floats on water, and is resistant to dust, drops, corrosion, and UV light.
- **Wireless Freedom:** Stay connected with Bluetooth technology, offering a generous connectivity range of up to 30 feet.
- **Long-Lasting Battery:** Play your favorite tunes for up to 12 hours with the rechargeable Lithium-ion battery. When it's time to recharge, the included USB-C cable will have your speaker ready in approximately 4 hours.
- **Smart Connectivity:** Access virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant with ease. The built-in microphone also allows for call functionality, making it easy to stay connected without missing a beat.
- **Ease of Use:** With the Bose Connect App, enjoy software updates, customizable settings, and effortless control of your listening experience.
- **Compact and Convenient:** The SoundLink Flex's compact design, utility loop for security, and ability to float in water make it exceptionally portable and easy to store.
- **Ready for Anything:** Drop-tested for durability and with a utility loop for added security, this speaker is designed to withstand all of life's adventures.

Whether you're embarking on a journey or simply enjoying a day by the pool, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker promises consistent, high-fidelity sound in a robust and travel-friendly package. Experience the freedom of excellent audio with Bose's renowned craftsmanship and innovative features. Your search for the perfect portable speaker ends here – take the plunge and let the music play, no matter where you are.

**Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - Your Go-To Audio Companion for Every Adventure**

Experience exceptional sound on the go with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, engineered for durability and designed with portability in mind. Whether you're traveling, heading outdoors, or lounging by the pool, this compact speaker is your perfect audio partner.

**Key Features:**

- **Superior Sound Quality:** Immerse yourself in deep bass, clear and expansive audio with exclusive Bose technologies, including a custom-engineered transducer and PositionIQ technology, which optimizes sound based on the speaker's orientation.

- **Rugged Durability:** With an IP67 rating, the Bose SoundLink Flex is waterproof, dustproof, and resistant to drops, rust, corrosion, and UV light. It's been rigorously drop-tested to ensure it can withstand the bumps and knocks of everyday use.

- **Smart and User-Friendly:** Access Siri and Google Assistant with ease, thanks to the built-in microphone, which also supports clear call functionality. Stay up to date and personalize your settings with the Bose Connect App, featuring software updates and customizable options.

- **True Portability:** Its compact design, utility loop for secure attachment, and the fact that it floats in water make it incredibly easy to carry and store. You won't have to worry about it sinking during poolside fun or outdoor adventures.

- **Long-Lasting Battery:** Keep your music playing for up to 12 hours per charge with the reliable Lithium-ion battery. When it's time to recharge, the included USB-C cable will have your speaker ready in approximately 4 hours.

- **Effortless Connectivity:** Bluetooth technology allows you to connect to your devices within a 30-foot range, ensuring your music keeps playing without interruptions, no matter where you place the speaker.

- **Sleek Aesthetic:** The Bose SoundLink Flex comes in a stylish black color that suits any setting, making it a sleek addition to your audio gear.

- **Versatile Use Cases:** Ideal for travel, outdoor adventures, or simply enjoying music by the pool, this speaker adapts to your lifestyle and delivers high-quality sound wherever you are.

**In the Box:**

- Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker (Black)
- USB-C Charging Cable
- Quick Start Guide
- Warranty Card

Don't let your music be confined to the indoors. Unleash powerful, lifelike sound wherever life takes you with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Get yours today and flex your sound to new heights!

**Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - Black**

Immerse yourself in a world of pristine sound with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Designed for the audiophile on the go, this portable speaker is engineered to deliver deep, clear, and immersive audio that transcends the boundaries of portable sound.

**Key Features:**

- **Superior Audio Quality:** Experience the richness of sound with advanced technologies like PositionIQ and a custom-engineered transducer that ensure your music is always lifelike and balanced, no matter where you are.
- **Robust Durability:** Fear no element with the IP67 waterproof rating, allowing the speaker to not only withstand water immersion but also float on water. Dust, shock, and corrosion resistance, coupled with UV light resilience, ensure your speaker braves the elements alongside you.
- **Wireless Connectivity:** Enjoy the freedom of Bluetooth connectivity with a range of up to 30 feet, making it perfect for travel, outdoor adventures, or poolside relaxation.
- **Long-Lasting Battery:** Keep the music playing with a powerful Lithium-ion battery that offers up to 12 hours of life per charge. Recharging is quick and easy with the included USB-C cable, requiring approximately 4 hours to reach full capacity.
- **Smart Features:** Access Siri or Google Assistant with a simple voice command thanks to the built-in microphone that also facilitates clear call functionality. Stay updated and customize settings with the Bose Connect App, which provides software updates and more.
- **Portability Perfected:** A compact design with a utility loop for secure attachment makes this speaker as portable as it is powerful. It's easy to hold, store, and even floats in water, so you can enjoy your music without worry.
- **Exclusive Technologies:** Bose's exclusive audio technologies deliver an unmatched listening experience that's as impressive as the speaker's robust build.
- **Versatile Use Cases:** Whether you're traveling, heading outdoors, or lounging by the pool, the SoundLink Flex is designed to be the perfect companion for all of life's adventures.

This Bose SoundLink Flex isn't just a speaker—it's a statement. With its sleek black design, it's as aesthetically pleasing as it is acoustically impressive. Embrace flexibility without compromising on sound quality or durability. Make every moment a soundtrack with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker.

### Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - Black

Immerse yourself in a world of sound with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Engineered for the ultimate audio experience, this portable speaker, complete with a built-in microphone, is designed to accompany you on all your adventures, whether you're traveling, enjoying the great outdoors, or simply lounging by the pool.

Don't let your audio experience be anything less than extraordinary. Choose the Bose SoundLink Flex for an unbeatable combination of sound, design, and ruggedness.

**Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - The Ultimate Portable Audio Experience**

Elevate your listening experience wherever you go with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Designed with travel, outdoor activities, and poolside entertainment in mind, this sleek black portable speaker with a built-in microphone ensures you enjoy deep, clear, and immersive audio no matter your location.

**Key Features:**

- **Exceptional Audio Quality:** With exclusive Bose technologies, including a custom-engineered transducer and PositionIQ technology, you can expect deep bass and crystal-clear sound that adapts to your orientation for an immersive experience.
  
- **Rugged Durability:** Ready for any adventure, the SoundLink Flex boasts an IP67 waterproof rating, allowing it to float on water and withstand dust, drops, rust, corrosion, and UV light exposure.

- **Wireless Freedom:** Experience effortless Bluetooth connectivity within a 30-foot range, and never miss a beat or a call with easy access to Siri and Google Assistant.

- **Long-Lasting Battery:** Keep the music going for up to 12 hours with a rechargeable lithium-ion battery. When it's time to recharge, the included USB-C cable will power up your speaker in approximately 4 hours.

- **Portability Perfected:** A compact design paired with a utility loop makes it easy to hold, store, and secure. You can confidently take your speaker everywhere, knowing it's built to float in water for those poolside parties.

- **Smart Features:**
  - Built-in microphone with call functionality.
  - Bose Connect App support for software updates, customizable settings, and more.
  
- **Suitable For All Occasions:** Whether it's travel, outdoor exploration, or lounging by the pool, the Bose SoundLink Flex is your perfect audio companion.

- **Additional Connectivity:** Keep the party going without interruption thanks to the reliable Bluetooth connection that spans up to an impressive 30 feet.

Embrace the sound of quality and durability with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Get ready to experience your music like never before, no matter where life takes you. Add this portable powerhouse to your audio arsenal today and flex the way you listen forever!

**Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - Your Go-Anywhere Companion**

Unleash powerful sound wherever you go with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Designed to deliver deep, clear, and immersive audio, this portable speaker is engineered with innovative technologies and robust features that adapt to all your adventures.

**Product Highlights:**

- **Immersive Audio Quality**: Experience lifelike sound with a custom-engineered transducer and Bose's exclusive PositionIQ technology that optimizes audio performance no matter the speaker's orientation.

- **Rugged Durability**: With an IP67 waterproof rating, the SoundLink Flex is not only waterproof but also dust, shock, corrosion, and UV light resistant. It even floats on water, making it perfect for poolside entertainment or beach outings.

- **Seamless Connectivity**: Enjoy wireless freedom with Bluetooth connectivity that offers a range of up to 30 feet. Access Siri or Google Assistant with ease through the built-in microphone and make calls or control your music without touching your phone.

- **Long-Lasting Battery**: Keep the music playing all day with up to 12 hours of battery life per charge. Rechargeable via a USB-C cable, it's ready to go after approximately 4 hours of charging.

- **Smart Features**: The Bose Connect App enhances your experience with software updates, customizable settings, and easy access to your favorite virtual assistants.

- **Portability Perfected**: Its compact design, easy-to-hold shape, and utility loop make it simple to take your SoundLink Flex on any journey. Whether you're traveling, heading outdoors, or lounging by the pool, your music moves with you.

- **Bold Black Color**: The sleek black color of the speaker is as versatile as it is stylish, complementing any setting while delivering the renowned Bose sound.

- **Built for Everyday Use**: Drop tested and built to last, this speaker can handle life's bumps and bruises, ensuring your music never misses a beat.

Experience the ultimate in portable, powerful, and durable audio with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Wherever life takes you, your soundtrack is in good hands.

**Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - Black**

Elevate your listening experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, engineered to deliver deep, clear, and immersive audio wherever life takes you. Designed for the audiophile on the go, this portable speaker boasts a robust set of features that combine high-quality sound with unmatched durability.

**Unmatched Audio Performance:**
- Experience the richness of deep bass and the clarity of detailed sound, powered by exclusive Bose technologies, including a custom-engineered transducer and innovative PositionIQ technology that optimizes audio performance no matter the orientation of the speaker.
- Enjoy an immersive audio experience that brings your music to life, whether you're traveling, having an outdoor adventure, or lounging by the pool.

**Durability and Resistance:**
- Built to withstand the elements, the SoundLink Flex carries an IP67 waterproof rating, meaning it's not just water-resistant but fully waterproof. Plus, it floats on water, making it perfect for your poolside entertainment.
- The speaker is also dust, shock, corrosion, and UV light resistant, ensuring that it can survive the rigors of your most daring escapades.

**Smart and Convenient Features:**
- Integrated microphone with access to Siri and Google Assistant, allowing for hands-free voice control and easy call functionality.
- Stay connected with app support from the Bose Connect App, offering software updates and customizable settings to tailor your listening experience.
- Bluetooth connectivity ensures you can stream your favorite tunes within a 30-foot range without any cords holding you back.

**Portability and Battery Life:**
- A compact design, complete with a handy utility loop, makes this speaker easy to hold, store, and secure on-the-go.
- The long-lasting Lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge, while the convenient USB-C cable makes recharging a breeze, taking approximately 4 hours.

Whether you're setting out on a journey or creating memories at home, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is your ultimate companion, promising both premium sound quality and the resilience to keep up with your lifestyle. Get yours today and transform the way you listen to music forever!

**Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - Portable, Rugged, and Superior Sound Quality**

Elevate your listening experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, designed for life on the go. This portable speaker with a microphone comes in a sleek black color, ready to accompany you on all your adventures.

**Product Features:**

- **Unmatched Audio Performance**: Enjoy deep, clear, and immersive audio with exclusive technologies, including a custom-engineered transducer and innovative PositionIQ technology, ensuring optimal sound in any orientation.

- **Built for the Elements**: With a waterproof rating of IP67, this speaker is not only waterproof but also floats on water, making it perfect for pool use. It’s fully resistant to dust, drops, corrosion, and UV light, guaranteeing durability in all outdoor conditions.

- **Smart Connectivity**: Effortlessly connect to your devices with Bluetooth and maintain a strong connection within 30 feet. Access Siri and Google Assistant with a simple voice command and manage your speaker settings with the Bose Connect App.

- **All-Day Battery Life**: The Lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime, ensuring your music lasts as long as your adventures do. Recharge quickly with the included USB-C cable, requiring approximately 4 hours for a full charge.

- **Portability Perfected**: The compact design and utility loop make it easy to hold, store, and secure during transit. Its lightweight build means you can take your music wherever you go without any hassle.

- **Call Functionality**: Take calls on the go with the built-in microphone, providing clear call quality and the convenience of hands-free communication.

- **Customizable Experience**: Stay up to date with software updates and customize your settings through the Bose Connect app for a personalized listening experience.

- **Travel & Outdoor Ready**: Whether you're hitting the road, exploring the outdoors, or chilling by the pool, the SoundLink Flex is your trusty companion. Its rugged build and superior sound are suitable for any environment.

**In the Box:**

- Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker
- USB-C Charging Cable
- Quick Start Guide

**Specifications:**

- Color: Black
- Type: Portable Speaker with Microphone
- Waterproof Rating: IP67
- Battery Life: Up to 12 hours
- Connectivity Range: Up to 30 feet
- Charging Time: Approximately 4 hours
- App Support: Bose Connect App

Get ready to immerse yourself in the sound and ruggedness that only Bose can offer. The SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is more than just a speaker—it's your constant companion in a world of adventure and music. Order yours today and unleash the soundtrack to your next adventure!

**Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - Black**

Unleash the power of your music with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, designed for those who are always on the move and demand nothing but the best in audio quality. Its compact and robust design makes it the perfect companion for all your adventures, whether you're traveling, enjoying the great outdoors, or just kicking back by the pool.

**Key Features:**

- **Premium Sound Quality:** Experience deep, clear, and immersive audio with exclusive technologies, including a custom-engineered transducer and PositionIQ technology that optimizes sound based on the speaker's orientation.

- **Built for the Elements:** With an IP67 waterproof rating, this speaker isn't just water-resistant—it's capable of being submerged. Furthermore, it floats, so you can enjoy your tunes in the water without worry. The SoundLink Flex is also dust, shock, rust, and corrosion-resistant, as well as protected against UV light, making it truly all-terrain ready.

- **Wireless Freedom:** Bluetooth connectivity allows you to stream music effortlessly within a 30-foot range, keeping your device safe and dry while you control the playlist.

- **Smart and Versatile:** Access Siri or Google Assistant with a simple button press thanks to the built-in microphone, enhancing your smart experience. The Bose Connect App opens up additional features like software updates and customizable settings for a personalized user experience.

- **Long-Lasting Battery:** Enjoy up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge with the efficient Lithium-ion battery. When it's time to recharge, the included USB-C cable will have your speaker back up in approximately 4 hours.

- **Portability Perfected:** The SoundLink Flex boasts a compact and durable design that's easy to hold and store. A utility loop ensures secure attachment, and its lightweight structure means it can accompany you on any journey.

- **Call Functionality:** Not just for music, the built-in microphone allows you to take calls, ensuring you stay connected even when you're out and about.

Whether you're gearing up for an epic adventure or planning a chill day by the water, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is your go-to for a superior audio experience that can keep up with your lifestyle. Get ready to be enveloped in sound that moves with you, no matter where life takes you.
